text:
View this post on Instagram
& it’s a film wrap for Varun on KALANK.. Our 4th film completed together and he still manages to surprise me with his hard work and crazy energy everyday.. Also manages to make me laugh like a crazy person by just being himself.. I can’t can’t can’t wait for you guys to see the stuff he’s done with his character in the film!!!! 🙌💫⭐️ 💃🏻🌞#KALANK
A post shared by Alia ✨⭐️ (@aliaabhatt) on Jan 17, 2019 at 8:35pm PST
title: Alia Bhatt & Varun Dhawan Get Emotional As They Wrap Up The Shoot Of Their 4th Film Together ‘Kalank’
description: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan had made their Bollywood debut with Dharma Productions’ Student Of The Year in 2012. After having done three films together – that include Student Of The Year, Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania, and Badrinath Ki Dulhania, they are all set to star in yet another project titled Kalank.
